qualification.description: Ambitious, resourceful & results-driven Web Developer with a Postgraduate Diploma in Web Development from Conestoga College, Ontario, Canada, and a Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science Engineering from Jaypee University of Engineering and Technology, India. Prolific career of over 6 months experience designing and developing sites from concept to rollout. Brings detailed understanding of various programming languages to webpage planning, development, and maintenance. A seasoned expert in languages such as HTML, PHP, ES6, CSS3, React Js, Node JS, and Express Js, WordPress. Takes on multiple simultaneous tasks with excellent time management abilities and a resourceful approach. Offer exceptional communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills. Possess strong ability to work independently and collaboratively in a robust team concept environment. I am seeking a web developer position with the opportunity to grow and contribute to the company's success through my innovative, creative skills.
qualification.stat_one:  Highly adept at front-end web development using JavaScript, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap, React Js, JavaScript, jQuery, CSS,RestAPI
qualification.stat_two:  Outstanding knowledge of Backend Development, including PHP, Node Js, Express, MongoDB, and MySQL.
qualification.stat_three:  Strong skills in developing custom WordPress themes from scratch using ACF, WooCommerce, Custom Post Type, Action & Filter Hooks
qualification.stat_four:  Demonstrating excellence in converting XD/Photoshop files to the Elementor website.
